description: Roughly 25% of known virus-related deaths have occurred in the United States.
title: Confirmed Coronavirus Cases In U.S. Double To 1 Million In Less Than 3 Weeks
title_page: Confirmed Coronavirus Cases In U.S. Double To 1 Million In Less Than 3 Weeks | HuffPost
maintext:
The number of confirmed cases of the coronavirus in the United States surpassed 1 million on Tuesday, more than doubling in less than three weeks, according to data compiled by Johns Hopkins University .
The U.S., home to about 4% of the global population, has reported about one-third of the worldâ€™s more than 3 million known coronavirus infections. The first known cases of the virus in China began appearing in December. It took nearly four months for the number of confirmed cases in the U.S. to hit 500,000 on April 10.
